item.title: Kurdish PKK burns guns in big step towards ending Turkey conflict
item.description: The ceremony took place under tight security at a cave in Iraqi Kurdistan - the disarmament process is expected to last all summer.

item.title: Nigeria has 'enough problems' and can't take deportees from US, minister says
item.description: Nigeria cannot accept Venezuelans because "we already have over 230 million people," says the foreign minister.

item.title: Iran could recover some enriched uranium after US strikes - Israeli official
item.description: The US has insisted that Iran's nuclear facilities were completely 'obliterated' during strikes in June.

item.title: Texans did not immediately receive flood alerts after request, audio reveals
item.description: A firefighter appears to have called for emergency alerts at least an hour before the first warnings were received.

item.title: Mystery interstellar object could be oldest known comet
item.description: Scientists have been racing to discover the origins of 3I/Atlas since it was spotted last week.
